rows.label: qst004001_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh! Did Yan send you over to
assistify me? I'm countin' on ya!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0002
rows.name:
What we need is information about the
criminal who cut the workers' wire!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0003
rows.name:
To solve a crime, first pound the
pavement! Get the down-low from
the townsfolks!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0004
rows.name:
Why not listen to the fiddle-faddle...
Uh... I mean, the pittle-pattle. *sigh*
No.

rows.label: qst004001_msg0005
rows.name:
Uh, anyway...
People gossip a lot, so
why don't you ask around!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0006
rows.name:
Yeah! Make sure you don't
miss anything!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0101
rows.name:
All right on the info collectin' front?
It's your civic duty to help catch the
criminal!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0102
rows.name:
Say, d'you know what a civic duty is?
Superbian soldiers used to say it a lot.

rows.label: qst004001_msg0103
rows.name:
Those fellas think they're so great
using all those big words!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0202
rows.name:
Well? Don't keep it to yourself!
Spill it!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0203
rows.name:
So it was Tirkin what did it,
with a bow! Whoa!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0204
rows.name:
Old man Mache made that wire
extra-strong, so it's kinda incredible
a bow would do it in!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0205
rows.name:
Awesome job, everyone!
I'll let Chief Yan know that the case
is done and dusted!

rows.label: qst004001_msg0206
rows.name:
Oh, and before I forget, here's your
reward for apprehending the perps!
